description: Test your leadership skills with this data-focused quiz. Answer 10 multiple-choice questions to learn how to collect, analyze, and interpret data to inform decisions.

mcqs.question: What is the primary purpose of collecting data?
Which of the following is a type of data?
What is data visualization used for?
What are metrics used to measure?
How many multiple-choice questions are in this quiz?
What is the benefit of assessing your knowledge?

generated_text:
"Module 23: Data" (86 minutes, Beginner)
Test your leadership skills with this data-focused quiz. Answer 10 multiple-choice questions to learn how to collect, analyze, and interpret data to inform decisions. Topics include data types, visualization, and metrics. Assess your knowledge and develop practical skills to drive business results.
